About ME

A Little bit of myself...

BIO

I'm currenty working at a Startup Company as a React Front-End Developer, and working on my self to become a freelancer in my spare time! I Lerned how to code in University, I Learned graphic design skills as a self-taught Skill as well as advanced web-Design skills. I'm a fast learner, team worker, I'm always keen usually on delivering the best I can do in anything! I Love to travel everywhere to discover new places/people, I Love to Learn new things, I Love Life !
